channel.title: Comments on: Adobe Air Reaches 1.0, Twitter Clients Blossom

item.title: By: Certified Treasury Professional
item.dc:creator: Certified Treasury Professional
item.description: Democracy means that anyone can grow up to be president and anyone who doesn't grow up can be vice president.
item.content:encoded: Democracy means that anyone can grow up to be president and anyone who doesn’t grow up can be vice president.

item.title: By: Andy Piper
item.dc:creator: Andy Piper
item.description: Hey, thanks for the linkage! Ironically since comparing Snitter and Tweetr I've now moved over completely to Twhirl, which is working great with AIR 1.0 and, well, "is just, better" than the others... can't really explain why but it really grabs me more than the other options.
item.content:encoded: Hey, thanks for the linkage! Ironically since comparing Snitter and Tweetr I’ve now moved over completely to Twhirl, which is working great with AIR 1.0 and, well, “is just, better” than the others… can’t really explain why but it really grabs me more than the other options.
